T02D2768:143a-0: @143a * // de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ras gzigs smon lam gyi dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2768:143a-1: rgyal sras rnams kyis bsgrub pa ni //
T02D2768:143a-2: sems can rnams la phan brtson pas //
T02D2768:143a-3: smon lam rgya mtsho spyod pa'i phyir //
T02D2768:143a-4: de yi dbang gyur 'di bshad bya //
T02D2768:143a-5: sngon nas bsnyen pa'i rim pa la //
T02D2768:143a-6: 'dris gyur snying rjes yid gdungs pa //
T02D2768:143a-7: mig dang smin mtshams snying dkyil du //
T02D2768:143a-8: byams sogs thig le gsum bsgom bya //
T02D2768:143a-10: de ni thugs rje mi phyed 'ong //
T02D2768:143a-11: lus can rnams kyi snying dang ni //
T02D2768:143a-12: nyon mongs me lce de nang gnas //
T02D2768:143a-13: de bzhin spyi gtsug grangs bzhin du //
T02D2768:143a-14: padma zlum dang ram rdo rje //
T02D2768:143a-15: gang tshe skye bo don tshol ba dang don mi tshol ba gcig dang mang po yang rung ste /
T02D2768:143b-0: bdag gi dbang po'i spyod yul du 'bab pas las la sbyar du rung @143b bar gyur pa dang /
T02D2768:143b-1: cho ga 'dis rnal 'byor du byas la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs la gsol ba btab ste /
T02D2768:143b-2: ma 'ongs pa'i dus su myur ba kho nar sems
T02D2768:143b-3: can khyed cag bdag gis smin pa'i gdul byar gyur
T02D2768:143b-4: cig ces smon lam btab la /
T02D2768:143b-5: nyi 'od thig les de dag padmo kha phyed nas //
T02D2768:143b-6: zla 'od can gyis gdung ba 'bar ba zhi bar bya //
T02D2768:143b-7: mi phyed zer gyis lus bkang rdo rje'i rgyas btab la //
T02D2768:143b-8: ci dgar khyed spyod ma lus myur du bdag gis bsgral //
T02D2768:143b-9: de rjes chos dang zang zing sbyin //
T02D2768:143b-10: mgu bya kun gyis sems bkug nas //
T02D2768:143b-11: glang chen myos la lcags kyu bzhin //
T02D2768:143b-12: mkhas pas 'gro ba dbang du bya //
T02D2768:143b-13: me tog la sogs brdas gtod pa'am //
T02D2768:143b-14: yang na lag pa rkang pa med //
T02D2768:143b-15: yun ring dmigs ltas mda' bsnun pa'am //
T02D2768:143b-16: bdag nyid chen po thabs la mkhas //
T02D2768:143b-17: kha ba rnams kyis ni khab len dang //
T02D2768:143b-18: bung pa rnams kyis me tog bzhin //
T02D2768:143b-19: de ni mi 'dod nyin gcig kyang //
